description: When you're looking for a tasty drink that's as beautiful to look at as it is in taste, try out the Commodore. This fruity and colorful classic features&nbsp;rum mixed with grenadine plus lemon juice,&nbsp;raspberry syrup, and some egg white helps create a lovely foam on top!
name: Commodore
recipeIngredient: 1 dash Raspberry syrup, or raspberry liqueur

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, put all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, put all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until combined and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until combined and chilled.
